data.description_html:
Your allies become elated, full of energy and joy.
Affected creatures gain a +2 morale bonus to effective Strength and Dexterity, and their speed increases by +5 feet.
Elation does not remove the condition of fatigue, but it does offset most of the penalties for being fatigued.
data.name: Elation
data.target: Allies in an 80-ft.-radius spread of you
